title: What song has the lyrics 'a long, long time ago'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Americans Pie. Artist Don Mclean Aong long time agoI can still remember howThat music used to make me smileAnd I knew if I had my chanceThat I could make those people danceAnd maybe they'd be happy for a whileBut Long, long time ago song was played by artist Jack Conte. His album VS4 was released in 2011 of Genre Indie. Lyrics He lived down by the farm houseWhere the stray cats sleep at nightJust a deck of cards, two fold up chairsAnd a ghost of his wifeThe Devil lived in his doorwayKept out the love and hopeHe lived a long long long timeA long time agoHe lost one yellow sunday when he reached into his throatPulled out all the people that he had been and tried to chokeBut together they overwhelmed him and he couldn't help but explodeHe lost a long long long timeA long time agoAsked a man in town and he said he is lonelySaid he was strange and he was all aloneNo place to goHe went up in smokeDo do doooo doooo doooo dooooWell he left in a hurryWhile the cops kicked in his doorHe jumped out the second storyWent do the road and highacked a carStuck his head out the broken window and he howled like the Devil's ownHe left a long long long timeA long time agoAsked a man in town and he said he is lonelySaid he was strange and he was all aloneNo place to goHe went up in smokeDo do doooo doooo doooo dooooHe flew right past the borderHe ditched his car and dyed his hairHe took out his deck of cards for a couple last rounds of solitareAnd he slept just like a babyThough the night was hard and coldHe flew a long long long timeA long time agoWhen he passed through the devils doorwayWell he knew just where he wasHe through back his head and howled s he resigned himself to dustAnd they found him in the Rio Fuerte his body was still afloatHe passed a long long long timeA long time agoHe passed a long long long timeA long time agoHe passed a long long long timeA long long long timeA long time ago Gustavo Woltmann
